name: moviereview
description: Step 1: Import 'movie_review.sql' script from extraresources folder into your mySQL Database and run it. Step 2: Go to terminal and run the following commands:     npm install Step 3: Every dependencies should be installed Step 4: run 'node db-connection.js' this should have no errors and be 'DBConnected' in terminal. If not check your credentials if they are correct.
